title: Biden says US would respond 'militarily' if China attacked Taiwan, but White House insists there's no policy change
content:
1. Biden says US would respond 'militarily' if China attacked Taiwan, but White House insists there's no policy change  CNN
  2. President Biden says America will defend Taiwan militarily if China decides to invade  CBS Mornings
  3. US military will defend Taiwan 'if it comes to that,' Biden says  Fox News
  4. Biden says US will intervene if China invades Taiwan  Fox Business
  5. Henry Kissinger says Taiwan cannot be at the core of negotiations between the U.S. and China  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Biden says US would respond 'militarily' if China attacked Taiwan, but White House insists there's no policy change  CNN
President Biden says America will defend Taiwan militarily if China decides to invade  CBS Mornings
US military will defend Taiwan 'if it comes to that,' Biden says  Fox News
Biden says US will intervene if China invades Taiwan  Fox Business
Henry Kissinger says Taiwan cannot be at the core of negotiations between the U.S. and China  CNBC
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: バイデン氏は、中国が台湾を攻撃した場合、米国は「軍事的に」対応すると述べたが、ホワイトハウスは政策に変更はないと主張している。
拜登说如果中国攻打台湾，美国将作出 "军事 "反应，但白宫坚持认为政策没有变化
拜登說如果中國攻打臺灣，美國將作出 "軍事 "反應，但白宮堅持認爲政策沒有變化
